item.title: Airbus recalls ‘significant number’ of planes. How airlines say it will affect holiday travel.
item.description: American says it expects ‘some delays’ but a quick fix. Delta predicts ‘limited’ impact. United says it’s not affected.

item.title: Stocks stage big comeback in best Thanksgiving week since 2008. What comes next?
item.description: Strong performance during Thanksgiving week is often followed by gains in December.

item.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
item.description: “‘I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?”

item.title: Beware of this Black Friday scam
item.description: “I received an email from eBay, or at least it looked like it was from an official eBay address.”

item.title: ‘We’re struggling’: I’m 41 with 5 kids and $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs to pay it off?
item.description: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits.”
